text: Roger Taylor may mean: *Roger Taylor (Queen drummer) (born 1949), drummer for Queen *Roger Taylor (Duran Duran drummer) (born 1960), drummer for Duran Duran *Roger Taylor (author), author of epic fantasy Hawklan series *Roger Taylor (college president), former president of Knox College in Galesburg, Illinois *Roger Taylor (tennis) (born 1941), British tennis player *Roger Taylor (American football) (born 1958), American football player *Roger Taylor (photographic historian) (born 1940), curator and photographic historian
title: Roger Taylor
